summary: After Atsushi commits murder, he is blackmailed into keeping a suitcase full of embezzled money. What follows is a descent into lustful, reckless actions and regret.
cast: Katsuo Nakamura|Mariko Kaga|Yumiko Nogawa|Masako Yagi|Toshiko Higuchi|Hiroko Shimizu|Shôichi Ozawa|Kei Satô|Rokkô Toura|Fumio Watanabe|Hôsei Komatsu|Akiji Kobayashi|Tôru Emori|Akira Hamada|Mamoru Hirata|Naramasa Komatsu|Daigo Kusano
title: Etsuraku
